description.src: A string containing a valid URL or an ImageInterface object. If the object is used, the srcset attribute is ignored.
description.srcset: A string containing a valid srcset attribute. Ignored if src is an ImageInterface object.
description.alt: Alt text of the imag. May override the alt text of the ImageInterface object.
description.caption: Image caption. That will be visible for the user.
description.removeCaption: Removes the visible caption. The caption may still be used as an alt-text for the image.
description.byline: Byline for additional information, placed under the caption
description.fullWidth: If the image should obtain the --full-width modifier.
description.cover: If the image should obtain the --cover modifier.
description.rounded: Border radius of the image, false for no radius. Accepted values are xs, sm, md, lg, full (circle)
description.placeholderEnabled: If the placeholder should be enabled, if false, the component will not render at all if the src is empty
description.placeholderText: Label to show if image is missing
description.placeholderIcon: Icon to display if image is missing / false to hide
description.placeholderIconSize: Icons size, please refer to image component for size.
